description: This Java class 'DataSeeder' is a Spring configuration component that provides a dev-only data seeder for Todo items. It seeds sample Todos into the repository when empty, only when the 'dev' profile is active.

classes.name: DataSeeder
classes.description: Configuration class that seeds sample Todo data for development environment when the repository is empty.

methods.name: seedTodos
methods.description: Creates a CommandLineRunner bean that seeds sample Todos into the repository if it is empty, only active in the 'dev' profile.
